title: League Just doesn't work for me after 4.20
body:
So I was getting this bug where I couldn't load games, saying that I had disconnected when my internet was clearly on and everything was working (I know it wasn't my internet because other multi-player games were working just fine).
I tried many routes to fix this issue, literally everything the forums had to offer as a solution and nothing worked so I just decided to completely wipe my computer of League and reinstall it however, now my issue is I cant even download the installer. WTF is going on?!?!
I can download anything else just fine, even the mac installer for LoL, but the bloody windows installer just won't download. I've even tried downloading as other regions, no luck. For some odd reason the download will just halt when it reaches 3.5mb of 27mb. I've restarted my computer, disabled firewalls, other browsers blah blah, you name it. Is there any reason this could be happening? 
I've only had this problem since yesterday and I've given up, HELP PLS

replies.body:
So you have tried downloading league from
https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload

Do you have the issue downloading it from another computer on the same network?

Yep, the same problem on two other computers on the same network. I just don't understand why it only blocks this particular download, anything else will download just like normal except for any windows LoL installer. Have also tried downloading from alternate links, doesn't work either.

I would suggest swapping out your router man.

You don't have like a firewall or anything between your router and computer?
